pageProduct.name: Avene A Oxitive Eyes Smoothing Eye Contour Cream 15ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Eau Thermale Avène A-Oxitive Smoothing Eye Contour Cream works through the night to boost cellular activity, detoxify and even out skin texture, preserving youthful skin thanks to a night renewing complex of active ingredients:
- Gradual Release Vitamin A (Retinaldehyde): boosts cellular activity, refines the skin’s texture and evens the skin tone. Reduces fine lines and wrinkles.
- Gradual Release Vitamin E (Pre-tocopheryl): fights against free radicals, powerful antioxidant

Directions

Apply in the evening to the eye contour and smooth along the eyebrow arch.
Not suitable for use while pregnant or breastfeeding. Avoid sun exposure and apply sunscreen daily.
